markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Silent Step](/Feats.aspx?ID=5561) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 11 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You Step, then [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=2404) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=2405). You still need to meet the requirements to Hide or Sneak, as normal.
name: Silent Step
